title: Live Updates: Blinken Pursues Regional Tour as Mideast Conflict Deepens
content: Secretary of State Antony J. Blinken sought to ease tensions on a visit to Israel, followed by a meeting with the Saudi crown prince in Riyadh. Israel is pressing on with its military campaigns in Lebanon and Gaza.
summary: Secretary of State Antony J. Blinken sought to ease tensions on a visit to Israel, followed by a meeting with the Saudi crown prince in Riyadh. Israel is pressing on with its military campaigns in Lebanon and Gaza.

title: Why Is Israel Poised to Attack Iran?
content: The two countries have been fighting a shadow war for years. But direct attacks are bringing direct reprisals, or at least plans for them.

title: Deadly ‘Terrorist Attack’ on Turkish Aerospace Company Leaves 5 Dead

title: Stuffed Into Trucks, 78 Thai Protesters Died. Their Killers Are Still Free.
